thread.title: BRIEF-Country Garden Holdings Co To Place 460 Mln Existing Shares At Hk$17.13 Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Country Garden Holdings Co To Place 460 Mln Existing Shares At Hk$17.13 Per Share

organizations.name: reuters) - country garden holdings company ltd

text:
Jan 17 (Reuters) - Country Garden Holdings Company Ltd :
* ‍CO ENTERED INTO PLACING AGREEMENT TO PLACE 460 MILLION EXISTING SHARES AT HK$17.13 PER SHARE
* COUNTRY GARDEN HOLDINGS - ESTIMATED NET PROCEEDS FROM PLACING AND BONDS ISSUE ABOUT HK$7,816.2 MILLION AND HK$15,490.8 MILLION, RESPECTIVELY
* ‍UNIT TO ISSUE BONDS IN AGGREGATE PRINCIPAL AMOUNT OF HK$15,600 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
